text: @realDonaldTrump Maybe instead of sitting on your enormous gluteus tweeting BS you could start giving a damn about Americans dying from coronavirus, the doctors and nurses who are developing PTSD and suicidality due to overwhelm treating the exploding #s of patients with COVID.
